thread_replies.author: 【公式】モンスターハンターワイルズ
thread_replies.text:
【Recovery Report】
There was an issue where communication errors "R359F-0-0" and "R319F-0-0" might occur when joining multiplayer sessions on all platforms.
※It has now been resolved.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused to our customers.
#モンハンワイルズ
